data.meta_description: Robert Gant, Esq. specializes in personal injury law
data.text:
ABOUT ROBERT N. GANT, ESQ.

Robert N. Gant, Esq., is an associate attorney of Gant & Hicks, PLLC. Mr. Gant is a 2023 graduate of Thurgood Marshall School of Law at Texas Southern University, and a 2016 graduate of The University of North Texas with a Bachelor of Business Administration in Business Integrated Studies with concentrations in Entrepreneurship and Finance.

Mr. Gant joined Gant & Hicks, PLLC in August 2023, focusing his practice on personal injury litigation, motor vehicle accidents, and wrongful death.

After receiving his Bachelor of Business Administration in 2016, Mr. Gant entered the legal profession as a paralegal for Gant & Hicks, PLLC. As a paralegal, Mr. Gant honed his experience in various aspects of personal injury, litigation, probate, estate planning, and business law.

Building on his knowledge and experience as a paralegal, Mr. Gant attended Thurgood Marshall School of Law in Houston, Texas, where he graduated with summa cum laude honors. During his time in law school, Mr. Gant served as the Justice-at-Large of the Thurgood Marshal Honor Court and held the esteemed position of Business Editor of the Thurgood Marshall Law Review, showcasing his exceptional leadership and commitment to business ethics.

As a Dallas native, Mr. Gant is involved in a number of local community service and civic activities and organizations. In his free time, Mr. Gant enjoys riding his bicycle, collecting vinyl records, and playing his guitar.
